name: Arthur
overview: The show revolves around the lives of 8-year-old Arthur Read, an anthropomorphic aardvark, his friends and family, and their daily interactions with each other.
tagline: What a wonderful kind of day!

episodes.name: Arthur's Eyes
episodes.overview: Arthur is embarrassed because he now has to wear glasses.

episodes.name: Francine's Bad Hair Day
episodes.overview: Francine tries to get through picture day, without messing up her meticulously-crafted hairdo.

episodes.name: Arthur and the Real Mr. Ratburn
episodes.overview: Arthur and Buster fear that their new teacher, Mr. Ratburn, is some kind of evil maniac who collects children's heads - until they discover the truth about him, of course.

episodes.name: Arthur's Spelling Trubble
episodes.overview: Arthur does some heavy-duty studying, in order to compete in the school's upcoming spelling bee.

episodes.name: D.W. All Wet
episodes.overview: Whew, boy is it HOT today. The Reads decide to head to the beach in order to cool off, but D.W. refuses to go along (she thinks there is an octopus in the water).

episodes.name: Buster's Dino Dilemma
episodes.overview: When the class goes on a field trip to a dinosaur museum, Buster finds a fossil on the ground - and wants to keep it for himself.

episodes.name: D.W.'s Imaginary Friend
episodes.overview: D.W. has an imaginary friend, Nadine, says she has to come everywhere, but Arthur is sick of it.

episodes.name: Arthur's Lost Library Book
episodes.overview: When Arthur checks out a library book and loses it a week later; he thinks he is banned from the library. So he and Binky team up to find it.

episodes.name: Arthur's Pet Business
episodes.overview: When Arthur desperately wants a dog, he starts a pet business. When he gets too many he decides to just take care of one pet.

episodes.name: D.W. the Copycat
episodes.overview: When D.W. gets told she doesn't like any interesting stuff, she decides to copy Arthur.

episodes.name: Locked in the Library!
episodes.overview: After Arthur called Francine a marshmallow, Francine and her friends get really mad and it looks like they are going to fight. But when they both get locked inside the Elwood City Library they either have to make up, or prepare for a long and scary weekend, because it's the weekend and the library closes until Monday.

episodes.name: Arthur Accused!
episodes.overview: Arthur had a job to collect coins for Mrs. McGrady to raise money for a new dog for the Elwood City firemen, and when he left the bag of quarters where Mrs. McGrady was working, she said she never received them. While this was happening, Buster opened his detective agency, he has no idea his first job will involve Arthur. Now, it is up to Buster to solve this mystery, was Arthur the real thief?....

episodes.name: Arthur Goes to Camp
episodes.overview: Arthur and his friends go to summer camp and Binky brings up the issue that it's boys vs. girls. The other team participating always won because of this problem, so now the kids of Elwood must work together to defeat them this year.

episodes.name: Buster Makes the Grade
episodes.overview: Buster's grades aren't as good as his jokes, and now he is on the verge of repeating his third grade year. If he does not receive at least a B on his next test, he fails...

episodes.name: Arthur's New Puppy
episodes.overview: Arthur has a new puppy is exactly what he wanted. But the only problem is that he destroys everything in sight, so can Arthur teach Pal to behave, before his parents do something with Pal because of all the disasters he is causing.

episodes.name: Arthur Bounces Back
episodes.overview: Arthur's dream is to have Moon shoes, but he does not have the ten dollars to get them. When he begins working chores to receive money, he got too desperate and does something he will regret.

episodes.name: Arthur Babysits
episodes.overview: Arthur has plenty of gripes about his past babysitters, but soon finds himself trying his hand at some babysitting of his own. He ends up having the Tibble Twins' Grandma ask him to babysit the infamous Tibble Twins and he agrees to the job. Despite the warnings from both his friends and D.W., he takes on the task and quickly finds himself overwhelmed. After some quick thinking, and a willingness to keep at things, he comes up with a plan.

episodes.name: Arthur's Cousin Catastrophe
episodes.overview: The Read Family is having a big reunion, with aardvark relatives from all over coming. Arthur normally enjoys the festivities, such as sack-racing and swapping stories, but finds himself hiding because he's worried that his cousin Mo has a big practical joke planned for him. He remembers her being awful to him in the past and is sure that she has something big planned. However, his worries might just be unfounded.

episodes.name: Arthur's Birthday
episodes.overview: Arthur is excited about his birthday. After shopping for party supplies, he makes invitations and passes them out at school. He then finds out that Muffy is having her party on the same day, at the same time. This starts a huge battle between the boys and the girls in the Ratburn class. Fortunately, Francine and Arthur devise a great solution to the problem.

episodes.name: Francine Frensky, Superstar
episodes.overview: Francine has always gotten the worst roles in school plays, so everyone in the Ratburn class asks Mr. Ratburn to give her a good part in the next one. The play is about Thomas Edison, and Francine is given the role of Edison himself. She takes her role very seriously, to the point where she starts to trying to run everything her way and insults her friends. After the hurt and the anger, they set out to show her that she can't just forget their needs

episodes.name: Arthur's Baby
episodes.overview: Viewers are taken back, as Arthur and D.W. recollect what happened when Baby Kate was first-born. D.W. is excited with anticipation, but Arthur is very worried. His worries are only made worse when his friends tell him about all the awful stuff that's going to happen when the baby comes. Still, Arthur, is determined to be a good big brother, but ends up thinking that the baby hates him!

episodes.name: D.W.'s Baby
episodes.overview: D.W. was excited to have a new little sister, but when she doesn't get to help much and the baby moves into her room, things don't seem so great. Kate stinks and makes a lot of noise. D.W. hatches a plan to get rid of her, but finds that maybe being a big sister isn't so bad after all.

episodes.name: Arthur Writes a Story
episodes.overview: Mr. Ratburn gives the class an assignment --- to write a story about anything they want. It seems like a simple assignment and it doesn't even have to be bound and sent to a publisher as Muffy suggests. Arthur, however, finds it a hard task when he starts trying to write to please everyone's tastes. He starts out with the simple story of how he got his dog Pal, but after following the advice of each of his friends, it morphs into a bizarre country tune about baby elephants being born in outer space.

episodes.name: Arthur and the Crunch Cereal Contest
Bully for Binky
episodes.overview: Binky is the toughest kid in school and everyone is afraid of him.

episodes.name: Arthur's Tooth
episodes.overview: When Arthur is teased by Francine and the others because he hasn't lost all of his baby teeth yet,  he becomes determined to lose his tooth and fit in with the others.

episodes.name: D.W. Thinks Big
episodes.overview: D.W. finds Aunt Lucy's wedding ring after she lost it at her wedding.

episodes.name: My Dad, the Garbage Man
episodes.overview: Every kid at school's parents has cool jobs except for Francine's dad. He's a garbage man and Francine is embarrassed by it so to make him look cool she tells the kids at school that he's a CIA agent.

episodes.name: D.W.'s Blankie
episodes.overview: D.W. loses her blankie and she and Arthur search all over town just to find it.

episodes.name: I'm a Poet
episodes.overview: Fern dares everyone to write a good poem for a contest. If the loser backs out they have to join art club for a year.

episodes.name: My Club Rules
episodes.overview: The Strawberry Festival is coming to town and Arthur and his friends all band together and form a club to create the perfect float, but when everyone gets their own ideas on what the float should be they all form their own clubs.

episodes.name: Arthur's First Sleepover
episodes.overview: Arthur throws a sleepover and invites Brain and Buster. He doesen't invite D.W. so she decides to ruin the sleepover.

episodes.name: Arthur Meets Mr. Rogers
episodes.overview: Mr. Rogers from Mr. Rogers Neighborhood comes to the Read family for a visit.

episodes.name: Binky Barnes, Art Expert
episodes.overview: Binky gets teamed up with Arthur and Buster for an art class assignment. They go to an art museum and Binky discovers a mistake with a certain drawing-

episodes.name: D.W., the Picky Eater
episodes.overview: D.W. is not invited to Grandma Thora's upcoming birthday dinner because she is a very picky eater.

episodes.name: Arthur Makes a Movie
episodes.overview: Arthur wants to see a movie, but he is too young, so he and his friends make a parody of the movie.

episodes.name: Arthur's Underwear
episodes.overview: Arthur has an embarrassing dream about being seen in his underwear and it gets even worse when it happens for real.

episodes.name: Buster Baxter, Cat Saver
episodes.overview: Buster saves a cat from up a tree and now he is known as a local hero because of an article in the newspaper.

episodes.name: Arthur's TV-Free Week
episodes.overview: Everyone has all pledged not to watch TV for one whole week.

episodes.name: Lost!
episodes.overview: Arthur gets on the wrong bus to his swimming lessons and gets lost.

episodes.name: D.W. Goes to Washington
episodes.overview: It's the first family trip and Arthur gets to choose. He chooses going to Washington, D.C. and D.W. thinks that she's going to be bored until she accidentally runs into the American president.

episodes.name: D.W.'s Deer Friend
episodes.overview: It's the second family trip and D.W. gets to choose. She chooses camping and D.W. gets attached to a deer she met and wants to bring home.

episodes.name: Arthur's Faraway Friend
episodes.overview: Arthur and Buster are on the urge of finishing their story for the sequel of Robin Hood. Everything is well until Arthur discovers that Buster has decided to go on a long trip to bond with his dad. Arthur fears that it's the end of their story and their friendship!

episodes.name: Water and the Brain
episodes.overview: Arthur and his friends are all invited by Muffy to go to Waterworld, but the Brain doesn't want to go. When he and Binky find out that the Brain is afraid of water, they try to cure this fear so they can all go together.

episodes.name: Sue Ellen's Lost Diary
episodes.overview: When Sue Ellen drops her diary at the library, she is worried that someone has found it and is going to read it.

episodes.name: Grandma Thora Appreciation Day
episodes.overview: Arthur and D.W. sleepover at Grandma Thora's house and find out that she gets lonely when they're not there. So Arthur and D.W. throw her a party to help her.

episodes.name: Love Notes for Muffy
episodes.overview: When Muffy annoys Francine and Brain, they decide to get even with her by sending her fake love notes for an anonymous person to make her look goofy.

episodes.name: Francine Redecorates
episodes.overview: When Francine and Katherine get sick of each other Katherine moves out to have her own room in the living room.

episodes.name: Arthur vs. the Very Mean Crossing Guard
episodes.overview: On the way home from school, Arthur and the Brain meet a crossing guard who wants $10.00 from them to cross the street.

episodes.name: D.W.'s Name Game
episodes.overview: D.W. gets praise from the Tibbles at being the best at name-calling, so she tries it on Arthur but it fails because he's older and knows more words so with the help of Katherine she looks up words in the Thesaurus that Arthur doesen't know and uses them against him.

episodes.name: How the Cookie Crumbles
episodes.overview: Muffy won last year's Strawberry baking contest in The Strawberry Festival because her father was the judge but this year when her friends help her bake strawberry cookies she takes the credit and wins the contest. Soon the cookies become so good that Muffy decides to run a business and sell them but not before she lets Arthur and friends get their share.

episodes.name: Buster's Back
episodes.overview: Buster returns after a extremely long trip to bond with his father and a nervous Arthur wonders if Buster's trip made him change.

episodes.name: The Ballad of Buster Baxter
episodes.overview: Buster feels left out having missed all the adventures since he was away. He feels that everyone has changed and they feel the same about him, so Arthur plans a party so they can rekindle their friendship with Buster.

episodes.name: D.W., All Fired Up
episodes.overview: D.W. loves school and wants to go everyday, but when Ms. Morgan starts doing fire drills she fears for her safety and doesn't want to go anymore.

episodes.name: I'd Rather Read It Myself
episodes.overview: The Tibble Twins can do everything better than D.W. So she tells them that she is able to read before them. They challenge her and she picks up a book and makes up a story, but when the Tibble's bring the book home for their Grandma to read to them her trick is revealed.

episodes.name: Arthur Goes Crosswire
episodes.overview: Mr. Ratburn assigns partners for a project and Arthur gets teamed up with Muffy. After spending a lot of time with her, he starts to act just like her.

episodes.name: Sue Ellen and the Brainasaurous
episodes.overview: Sue Ellen gets partnered with Brain in another project by Mr. Ratburn. Soon he starts to be a report hog and gets on Sue Ellen's nerves.

episodes.name: Background Blues
episodes.overview: Mr. Ratburn assigns a project that involves family ancestors.  Muffy and Francine turn this project into a competition to see who has the best ancestors.

episodes.name: And Now Let's Talk to Some Kids
episodes.overview: Arthur's class gets picked to be on a television show in which the Brain does not want to go on.

episodes.name: The Chips Are Down
episodes.overview: D.W. eats a big green potato chip and to get her off his back Arthur tells her that it's fatal and she could die. So D.W. spends this day as her last day until she finds out the truth.

episodes.name: Revenge of the Chip
episodes.overview: D.W's mom tells the newspapers and everyone in town that story about D.W. and the green chip embarrassing her ultimately.

episodes.name: Binky Rules
episodes.overview: Someone has been writing "Binky Rules" all over Lakewood Elementary and Mr. Morris thinks it is Binky.  Binky says he didn't do it, so Fern and Buster are trying to find out.

episodes.name: Meet Binky
episodes.overview: Everyone gets tickets for a concert starring the new group Binky.

episodes.name: Arthur Rides the Bandwagon
episodes.overview: Everyone has a Woogle, the popular new toy... everyone except Arthur.  He think that they're dweeby, until everyone else has one.

episodes.name: Dad's Dessert Dilemma
episodes.overview: After one of Mr. Read's scrumptious desserts makes Arthur the most popular kid in class, Arthur can't stop asking his dad to cook. Despite his dad's busy catering schedule, Arthur promises delectable desserts to anyone and everyone.

episodes.name: Popular Girls
episodes.overview: After Fern and Sue Ellen take a quiz in a teen magazine, they change the way they act.  Fern turns loud and aggressive, while Sue Ellen falls back in everything.

episodes.name: Buster's Growing Grudge
episodes.overview: When Binky steals Buster's joke for his report, Buster has a grudge against him.

episodes.name: Arthur's Treasure Hunt
episodes.overview: When Buster finds an arrowhead in his yard; everyone wants to know if there are treasures in their yards.

episodes.name: The Return of the King
episodes.overview: When Mr. Ratburn's class goes to a medieval style fair, his old teacher Mr. Pryce-Jones comes with his new class. Mr. Pryce-Jones' class wins all the games.

episodes.name: Attack of the Turbo Tibbles
episodes.overview: The Tibble's watch a dangerous superhero show and imitate it. Things get out of hand when they pretend that D.W. is a bad guy.

episodes.name: D.W. Tricks The Tooth Fairy
episodes.overview: D.W. wants money to buy a toy, so she plans to trick the tooth fairy so she can earn enough money for it.

episodes.name: Double Tibble Trouble
episodes.overview: Tommy Tibble gets sick and Timmy Tibble gets sad so D.W. and Emily pretend to be Tibbles to make Timmy feel better until Tommy is well.

episodes.name: Arthur's Almost Live Not Real Music Festival
episodes.overview: Arthur and Buster show D.W. that you don't need cameras, lights, etc. to make a music video.

episodes.name: What Scared Sue Ellen?
episodes.overview: After everyone has told scary stories, everything scares Sue Ellen.

episodes.name: Clarissa is Cracked
episodes.overview: Grandma Thora lends her doll Clarissa to D.W. for a week. She has a lot of fun with her until Clarissa breaks.

episodes.name: Arthur's Dummy Disaster
episodes.overview: When George brings his dummy Wally to school, everyone loves him.  But after awhile, they get tired of Wally.

episodes.name: Francine and the Feline
episodes.overview: Francine never had a pet until Nemo comes along.

episodes.name: Mom and Dad Have a Great Big Fight
episodes.overview: When Mom and Dad begin to fight over spilled milk, D.W. is worried that they might be getting a divorce.

episodes.name: D.W.'s Perfect Wish
episodes.overview: Arthur notices that D.W. is not excited about her birthday. So he tells her about her memories throughout her year as a four-year-old.

episodes.name: Arthur and D.W. Clean Up
episodes.overview: Arthur is devastated that he has to clean up his room, and D.W.'s too.

episodes.name: The Long, Dull Winter
episodes.overview: The gang decides to make up another holiday for the wintertime.

episodes.name: D.W.'s Library Card
episodes.overview: D.W. discovers that she can get her own library card and feel the power as Arthur has, but she can not write her own name. When she does and waits a week for a book to come in, she borrows it but never reads it because she thought she might destroy it.

episodes.name: Arthur's Big Hit
episodes.overview: After Arthur worked hard to build a model airplane, D.W. throws it out the window to see if it flies and the model exploded. Arthur gets extremely mad and strikes her.

episodes.name: Hide and Snake
episodes.overview: While the kids played hide and seek, a snake shows up and Arthur brings it home.

episodes.name: Muffy's New Best Friend
episodes.overview: Tired of playing with Muffy because she never played soccer, Francine starts to hang out with Jenna. So Muffy searches for a new friend.

episodes.name: Buster's Breathless
episodes.overview: D.W. obtains poison ivy while playing a game. Buster recaps his problem with asthma and how everyone was afraid of him being injured or getting themselves injured.

episodes.name: The Fright Stuff
episodes.overview: The girls prank the boys by inviting them to Muffy's celebration for the new Scare Your Pants Off Club Books.

episodes.name: The Contest
episodes.overview: Arthur and his friends enter a contest that they have to wait five years to find out the winner.

episodes.name: Prove It
episodes.overview: When D.W. makes up a fake science museum, she makes up science to go with it.

episodes.name: The Blizzard
episodes.overview: A blizzard strikes Elwood City and all the kids have to return home. But before they do, they have to hand in their reports. Francine does not finish so she has to write a longer report over the snowstorm days while the adults are scrambling all over the city, losing electricity and supplies.

episodes.name: The Rat Who Came to Dinner
episodes.overview: Mr. Ratburn stays at the Read's house because the roof collapsed from the snow. Surprisingly, Arthur begins to like Mr. Ratburn.

episodes.name: D.W. Tale Spins
episodes.overview: Grandma Thora tells D.W. a myth. This makes her show Arthur that she would make a better story than the Veggiemorphs using mythologies in her own version.

episodes.name: Prunella Gets It Twice
episodes.overview: Prunella receives a Polly Locket for her birthday from her sister. But she also gets one from Francine and Prunella did not like the gift. making Francine unhappy. Then Ghosts visit Prunella to tell her about how Francine worked so hard to get the doll.

episodes.name: Binky Barnes, Wingman!
episodes.overview: Binky Barnes has a favourite pastime when Bug Week comes along: Butterflies. He worked very hard to collect these bugs for his report especially a hard blue-coloured kind.

episodes.name: To Beat or Not to Beat
episodes.overview: The kids try to stop Francine from playing the drums and singing at the same time for the Talent Show.

episodes.name: 1001 Dads
episodes.overview: Arthur believes that Buster is sad because Buster could not bring his dad to the Father's Day Picnic to have a fun time because his dad is divorced. So Arthur tries to help him by borrowing a father for Buster just for that day.

episodes.name: Prunella's Prediction
episodes.overview: Flashpants were all that Prunella wanted for her birthday. When she gets a hint from her sister, she gets excited about getting them, but the gift was not what she expected.

episodes.name: What is that Thing?
episodes.overview: Arthur and his friends are facing impossible tasks, and they encounter a device that could help them fix all those problems, but they do not know what it is.

episodes.name: Buster's Best Behavior
episodes.overview: Buster and Arthur feel like that they are boring and they think they are not good at anything, so they try to imitate each others' lifestyle.

episodes.name: My Music Rules
episodes.overview: Cellist Yo-Yo Ma and Saxophonist Joshua Redman were invited by Grandma Thora and D.W. They battle over what kind of music is better than the rest-Classical or Jazz.

episodes.name: That's a Baby Show!
episodes.overview: Arthur enjoys a show meant for younger kids  and his friends tease him for being a baby.

episodes.name: Arthur and the Big Riddle
episodes.overview: Arthur is chosen to appear on the popular game show Riddle Quest.

episodes.name: Double Dare
episodes.overview: Arthur, Francine, and The Brain dare each other to skip school for a day

episodes.name: Kids are From Earth, Parents are From Pluto
episodes.overview: Lakewood Elementary is having an open house. Sue Ellen is excited to introduce her parents until she hears her friends tell stories about their parents being embarrassing.

episodes.name: Nerves of Steal
episodes.overview: Buster can't cope with being the only kid in Elwood City who doesn't have a Cybertoy.

episodes.name: It's a No-Brainer
episodes.overview: After a loss in the rehearsal math-a-thon against Buster, Brain decides to work on his new life as a Comedian. Now Brain wants to hand everything down to Buster so Buster could be the new brain.

episodes.name: The Shore Thing
episodes.overview: Arthur and D.W. are obsessed with going to Aqualand. They beg their father to go with them, but David tells them that going to Ocean Zone would be more fun.

episodes.name: The World Record
episodes.overview: Arthur tells his friends about the World Records that have been broken, and they try to break some of the records. Buster, walking backwards, Francine trying to kick a soccer ball in the air the most times, Muffy not talking, and Binky building the largest popsicle stick bridge. All these were very hard tasks, so Arthur decides to make the largest pizza in the world by getting help from the whole city.

episodes.name: The Cave
episodes.overview: The kids of Lakewood Elementary go to the Clark Caves, and Francine and D.W. starts to bother Arthur of being afraid of bats and the dark.

episodes.name: The Lousy Week
episodes.overview: An army of lice has been unleashed on the heads of Lakewood Elementary. Now, the whole school must get rid of them before they all go insane.

episodes.name: You Are Arthur...
episodes.overview: D.W. and Tibbles help Arthur train for a 3K race against Brain.

episodes.name: The Election
episodes.overview: Mr. Ratburn's class has a mock election. Muffy and Arthur are taking it really seriously until Binky is nominated.

episodes.name: Francine Goes to War
episodes.overview: When there is a new neighbour in Francine's apartment, Francine and Muffy try everything to get rid of her.

episodes.name: Sleep No More
episodes.overview: Buster's destiny was to have a Pizza Paula's all-you-can-eat contest. The only problem is that he is too excited so he could not go to sleep.

episodes.name: Pet Peeved
episodes.overview: Binky volunteers to look after Francine's cat Nemo for the weekend.

episodes.name: The Last of Mary Moo Cow
episodes.overview: When D.W.'s favorite TV show is cancelled, she makes a petition to bring it back.

episodes.name: Bitzi's Beau
episodes.overview: Buster's mom announces she has a new boyfriend, and Buster thinks his mom won't have time for him with her new boyfriend.

episodes.name: Just Desserts
episodes.overview: After eating too much sweets and desserts, Arthur has dreams involving Brothers Grimm fairy tales.

episodes.name: The Big Dig
episodes.overview: Arthur and D.W. don't want to go to Grandpa Dave because he only want to sleep and play checkers. One day Grandpa Dave shares a secret map, and Arthur and D.W. hunt for the buried treasure.

episodes.name: Arthur's Family Feud
episodes.overview: When their father's perfect soufflé is destroyed, Arthur and D.W. both tell their version of what happened.

episodes.name: Muffy Gets Mature
episodes.overview: Muffy began to read Mature Miss magazines. She began to act more mature and thinks all her friends are too juvenile.

episodes.name: Sue Ellen Gets Her Goose Cooked
episodes.overview: Sue Ellen is the champion of the popular Internet game Virtual Goose. She becomes so obsessed, however, that she starts imagining her friends as geese to be conquered.

episodes.name: Best of the Nest
episodes.overview: Now that the gang has beaten Virtual Goose, they move onto Best of the Nest, where five geese fight to survive in the virtual woods. As the competition escalates, Brain becomes inspired to initiate a camping trip in the real woods.

episodes.name: Arthur Plays the Blues
episodes.overview: Arthur's beloved piano teacher is retiring, but she assures him that the new teacher is outstanding. When he meets Dr. Fugue, who's as strict as he is odd, Arthur begins to doubt his own abilities.

episodes.name: Buster's Sweet Success
episodes.overview: When Buster signs up to sell candy for the band, he figures it's easy money. Buster soon wishes that somebody loved chocolate more than he does, because he eats it all himself.

episodes.name: Prunella's Special Edition
episodes.overview: Every kid in town is lining up to get the latest book about Harry Skreever except Prunella. She ordered a monogrammed, limited edition, coming all the way from England.

episodes.name: The Secret Life of Dogs and Babies
Muffy's Soccer Shocker
episodes.overview: Muffy's proud that her dad is the new soccer coach until he exhausts the team with demanding drills.

episodes.name: Brother, Can You Spare a Clarinet?
episodes.overview: The try-outs for the Young Person's Orchestra are coming to Lakewood Elementary. Everyone agrees that Binky is a shoe-in since he's the best musician in school.

episodes.name: The Boy Who Cried Comet!
episodes.overview: Buster is convinced that he's seen real UFOs, and he uses Muffy's fancy new telescope to get the proof.

episodes.name: Arthur and Los Vecínos
episodes.overview: Mr. Sipple from next door is moving away and Arthur wonders-who will be the new neighbours. When Alberto Molina and his family settle in, Arthur makes a new friend and learns about a different culture.

episodes.name: Citizen Frensky
episodes.overview: After visiting The Elwood City Times, Francine decides to start her own paper. The tabloid, complete with embarrassing photos and sensationalized headlines, is a smashing success until all her friends stop speaking to her.

episodes.name: D.W.'s Backpack Mishap
episodes.overview: D.W. accidentally grabs the wrong backpack at the pool. Arthur and D.W. must try to find out who it belongs to since most of the letters on the name tag rubbed off.

episodes.name: The Boy with His Head in the Clouds
episodes.overview: George has dyslexia and and wants Binky to teach him to be more hard-headed, so none will bully him.

episodes.name: More!
episodes.overview: D.W. is thrilled to be getting an allowance. When she learns that Emily and the Tibbles have been already getting one and have more money, D.W. is devastated.

episodes.name: Rhyme for Your Life
episodes.overview: While struggling to write a poem for his mom, Binky falls asleep and gets trapped in Verseberg, where it's a crime not to rhyme.

episodes.name: For Whom the Bell Tolls
episodes.overview: D.W. lost her voice and their mother asks Arthur to take care of her.

episodes.name: The Good Sport
episodes.overview: When the Athlete of the Year Award doesn't go to Francine, she makes no effort to hide her hurt feelings from winner Jenna.

episodes.name: Crushed
episodes.overview: Arthur has a crush on his new babysitter Sally, whose favourite hobbies are eating ice cream and playing videogames.

episodes.name: Arthur Loses His Marbles
episodes.overview: When Arthur discovers that Grandma Thora is a marbles champion, he trains with her so he can beat all his friends. And though Thora teaches Arthur everything he knows, she doesn't teach him everything she knows.

episodes.name: Friday the 13th
episodes.overview: Brain doesn't believe in superstitions. When Brain's defiance leads to a string of bad luck, he's stunned.

episodes.name: Cast Away
episodes.overview: Arthur is thrilled when Dad invites him to go fly fishing for the weekend.

episodes.name: The Great Sock Mystery
episodes.overview: One of D.W.'s socks goes missing, so Pal and Kate try to find it.

episodes.name: Francine's Split Decision
episodes.overview: When Francine's bowling tournament and her cousin's bar mitzvah take place at the same time, her friends help her attend both events at once.

episodes.name: Muffy Goes Metropolitan
episodes.overview: Muffy happily accepts Sue Ellen's invitation to spend the weekend in Crown City, a nearby metropolis.

episodes.name: Ants in Arthur's Pants
episodes.overview: Arthur builds an ant farm for Mr. Rathburn's science class, but all the ants spill out and he must find a way to attract them back in.

episodes.name: To Tibble the Truth
episodes.overview: When the Tibble twins' constant lying lands them in constant trouble, they promise to tell only the truth.

episodes.name: Waiting to Go
episodes.overview: After Binky accidentally breaks Brain's new watch during a soccer game, the two get into several arguments while waiting for their parents to pick them up.

episodes.name: Elwood City Turns 100!
episodes.overview: Mr. Ratburn' s class is chosen to stage a musical tribute to Elwood City for its centennial celebration.

episodes.name: Pick a Car, Any Car
episodes.overview: When the Read family car breaks down, Arthur is heartbroken. He wants to save the vehicle before his parents replace it.

episodes.name: Jenna's Bedtime Blues
episodes.overview: An invitation to Muffy's exclusive slumber party terrifies Jenna, an occasional bed-wetter.

episodes.name: D.W.'s Time Trouble
episodes.overview: D.W. is sick and tired of being bossed around all the time and demands to know why she couldn't have been born before Arthur.

episodes.name: Buster's Amish Mismatch
episodes.overview: During a field trip to Amish country, Buster becomes enamoured with the simple lifestyle and vows to forgo all modern conveniences back home.

episodes.name: The World of Tomorrow
episodes.overview: Since Binky's repeating third grade, he's dreading Mr. Ratburn's annual class sleepover at the Science Museum. After all, he remembers how boring it was last year.

episodes.name: Is There a Doctor in the House?
episodes.overview: Arthur and D.W. try to help out around the house when their parents catch a cold.

episodes.name: Prunella Sees the Light
episodes.overview: When Marina comes over for a sleepover, Prunella is worried that Marina may get injured because she is blind.

episodes.name: Return of the Snowball
episodes.overview: D.W. finds that her missing snowball has re-appeared in the freezer and tries to prevent it from being stolen again.

episodes.name: April 9th
episodes.overview: After a huge fire in the teacher's lounge during the middle of the day Elwood Elementary School gets closed down.

episodes.name: Dear Adil
episodes.overview: Arthur is excited to have a new pen pal named Adil and fantasizes about what life would be like in Turkey.

episodes.name: Bitzi's Break-Up
episodes.overview: When Bitzi and Harry break up, Buster is sad to lose his favorite baseball buddy.

episodes.name: Fernfern and the Secret of Moose Mountain
episodes.overview: The Elwood city kids are thrilled to go hiking, but when pro Francine is assigned to be novice Fern's partner, squabbling ensues.

episodes.name: Thanks a Lot, Binky
episodes.overview: When Binky is deprived of a simple thank you, he resolves to quit doing good things for other people.

episodes.name: Arthur's Snow Biz
episodes.overview: Both Arthur and Buster start their own snow-removal businesses, eager to rake in the big bucks.

episodes.name: Bugged
episodes.overview: When Francine insults the Brain, he wakes up to find out he has a bug's body,

episodes.name: Fernkenstein's Monster
episodes.overview: When Fern composes a truly terrifying tale, the rest of her classmates begin to fear her. Determined to win them back, she tries her hand at a being a fun author rather than a scary one.

episodes.name: D.W., Dancing Queen
episodes.overview: When Binky and D.W. are paired up for a school project, they discover a mutual love for dancing, and decide to perform for the class.

episodes.name: Vomitrocious!
episodes.overview: When Francine gets sick in school one day, she is reluctant to return.

episodes.name: Sue Ellen Chickens Out
episodes.overview: Chickin Lickin, a fast food restaurant wants to replace the gang's beloved Sugar Bowl and Sue Ellen is outraged.

episodes.name: Postcards From Buster!
episodes.overview: Buster, his father, and the Reads travel to New York City.

episodes.name: Desk Wars
episodes.overview: Arthur and his friends are trying to get the best desk.

episodes.name: Desperately Seeking Stanley
episodes.overview: Arthur sells his bear Stanly, after he thinks the Brain thinks he needs to get rid of the bear, and move on.

episodes.name: Muffy's Art Attack
episodes.overview: Muffy thinks that art is pointless and she has the sudden idea to put on her own Art Show.

episodes.name: Tales from the Crib
episodes.overview: When Vicita is upset that she has to give up her crib, D.W. tells her how she grew out of her crib and gave it to Kate.

episodes.name: Flea to Be You and Me
episodes.overview: Pal and Kate meet a flea who's a circus performer.

episodes.name: Kiss and Tell
episodes.overview: Emily got kissed by a boy in France. Now D.W tries to find someone to kiss her.

episodes.name: Big Horns George
episodes.overview: George's bad day gets worse when he comes over to Mrs. McGrady's house to sing for Koko Taylor and his friends insult his quiet voice.

episodes.name: *Bleep*
episodes.overview: At a glass shop, D.W. overhears a word she doesn't know. D.W. is afraid to ask anyone what the word means, because she thinks that it causes people to break stuff. Arthur and the Tibbles warn her not to say it in front of grownups, or they will become zombie slaves (or at least the Tibbles say...). D.W. and Nadine put it to the test by having the neighborhood kid Vecita say it to her parents. D.W. accidentally says it to her mother while spying, and after apologizing to the neighbors, Mother tells her what the cuss word means. But the next day at school, all DW's friends are saying it. Here we go again...

episodes.name: Castle in the Sky
episodes.overview: The gang is devastated after their tree house collapses.

episodes.name: Tipping the Scales
episodes.overview: Everyone in Arthur's chorus group is excited about their upcoming performance in Crown City.  But when Ms. Krasny gets sick, she is replaced by Arthur's strict piano teacher Dr. Fugue.

episodes.name: Francine's Big Top Trouble
episodes.overview: Francine goes to circus camp thinking she would as good as her sister Catherine. But when Francine does badly, she thinks that when it is time for the circus show she won't have anything to do.

episodes.name: George Blows His Top
episodes.overview: Buster takes advantage of generous George, asking him for so many things. But George is shy and is afraid to tell Buster no.

episodes.name: Arthur Weighs In
episodes.overview: Having landed a role for a class play, Arthur finds that he can't fit into his outfit. He and his friends team up to get him in shape.

episodes.name: The Law of the Jungle Gym
episodes.overview: When Muffy wants to take photos from the jungle gym with her new camera, she gets into into an argument with the Tough Customers, the school bullies.

episodes.name: Buster's Green Thumb
episodes.overview: Buster learns to care for plants.

episodes.name: My Fair Tommy
episodes.overview: Fed up with getting punished for Timmy's behaviour, Tommy asks D.W. to teach him good manners.

episodes.name: Lights, Camera, Opera!
episodes.overview: Mr. Crosswire brings Muffy to an opera.

episodes.name: All Worked Up!
episodes.overview: Arthur's good grade streak slips when his mother takes a client and he fears she won't be around enough.

episodes.name: Arthur Makes Waves
episodes.overview: James invited D.W. and Arthur to swim at his house. Arthur is shocked to learn that Molly is James's older sister.

episodes.name: It Came From Beyond
episodes.overview: Grandma Thora takes in a stray dog that is extremely mean.

episodes.name: Three's a Crowd
episodes.overview: Prunella gets jealous when Marina joins yoga lessons with her and her mother.

episodes.name: A is for Angry
episodes.overview: Arthur's friends take his game against Brain in an interscholastic checkers tournament too seriously and he is frustrated with their unwanted support.

episodes.name: The A Team
episodes.overview: When a better soccer team comes to town, Francine and the Brain quit their old team to join them.

episodes.name: Emily Swallows a Horse
episodes.overview: Emily makes up an excuse to keep the ball D.W. has found, but starts telling bigger lies to cover up the first one.

episodes.name: D.W. Beats All
episodes.overview: The Tibbles receive a new set of drums and want to perform in the Summer Serenade Festival, leaving D.W. to moan over not having her own instrument.

episodes.name: Buster the Myth Maker
episodes.overview: Arthur and Buster go to the park to investigate a rumor that tigers are loose there.

episodes.name: Binky Goes Nuts
episodes.overview: Binky discovers that he's allergic to peanuts.

episodes.name: Breezy Listening Blues
episodes.overview: Much to his horror, Brain gets a B Minus on a test.

episodes.name: Happy Anniversary
episodes.overview: #1001"Happy Anniversary"Mr. Ratburn shows a film about perspective and then assigns the class an essay about it. Arthur and Buster are disappointed to have homework on the weekend of the big Bionic Bunny / Dark Bunny special (in which everything will be revealed), but vow to complete it before the start of the special. Arthur, however, struggles with the assignment. Mr. and Mrs. Read are celebrating their tenth anniversary at a fancy restaurant. They're dropping Arthur off for Buster's sleepover and D.W. at Grandma Thora's. But car troubles leave everyone stranded. Things seemingly go from bad to worse when Arthur and D.W. get locked in a storage room in an old diner. They're disappointed, and a bit scared, but find inspiration in an old radio drama called "Kid Carter and his Sidekick Mistral.

episodes.name: Swept Away
episodes.overview: Arthur, Buster and D.W. enjoy summer vacation at the beach. When it becomes unsafe to swim, Grandma Thora suggests building a sandcastle and they quickly become immersed in this pastime. When the tide threatens to sweep away their castle, Arthur isn't ready to let it go.

episodes.name: Arthur Sells Out
episodes.overview: Arthur is excited about the release of the new video game Dark Bunny: Return of the Moomies, but doesn't have the money to buy it. When his attempt at online sales through the school newspaper falls flat, Buster recommends getting advice from Muffy. Muffy's sales tactics soon result in great sales, but border on dishonesty and leave Arthur facing an important moral decision.

episodes.name: Buenas Noches, Vicita
episodes.overview: When Vicita loses her favorite storybook, it looks like she may never get to sleep again. Nothing else seems to help her sleep, but then D.W. helps her to see that she knows the story by heart. Worried, however, that she got one of the details wrong, she sets out to correct her error in a dream.

episodes.name: Phony Fern
episodes.overview: Fern is offended by everyone's constant use of cell phones, until she surprisingly becomes addicted to the one her parents got her for "emergency use only." After being shown its cool features by Muffy, they become cell phone pals and are soon chatting constantly.

episodes.name: Baby Kate and the Imaginary Mystery
episodes.overview: When Nadine misses an appointment for tea with Vicita's imaginary friend, Tweenie, Baby Kate and Pal grow concerned. They launch an investigation, worried that she may have been kidnapped by the Tibbles. Along the way, Francine's cat Nemo is pulled into the investigation.

episodes.name: The Making of Arthur
episodes.overview: When Matt Damon announces a new series called Postcards from You, Arthur and his friends are excited by the opportunity to create videos about their daily lives. Everyone has a great idea for a video except Arthur, who isn't sure what to do. He keeps bouncing between ideas, but can't settle on anything, and finds himself hindered by D.W.'s insistence on participating. He also has to contend with having been chosen as Buster's project.

episodes.name: Hic or Treat
episodes.overview: As Arthur tries to prepare his costume for Halloween, he finds himself distracted by D.W.'s persistent case of hiccups. She's been hiccuping for two days straight it seems like they just won't go away. On Brain's advice, he tries scaring her, but it doesn't seem to work. He discovers that D.W. is frightened by some very unusual things.

episodes.name: Francine's Pilfered Paper
episodes.overview: When Mr. Ratburn assigns everyone in his class an individual topic about Thanksgiving to write a five-page report on, Francine feels that she's "doomed." She has no idea how she's going to come up with five pages on the Pilgrims' eating habits, until Brain shows her how to use a search engine to find information about the subject on the Internet. She copies the contents of an entire article and hands it in as her report, looking forward to a relaxing holiday. She then learns from her sister that what she's done is plagiarism and could get her suspended from school.

episodes.name: D.W. on Ice
episodes.overview: When Emily announces a skating party to celebrate mid-winter, D.W. brags about being a great skater. She feels she's so good that she even offers lessons to James, who is worried about his skating skills. D.W., however, is overconfident, having only gone ice-skating three times in her life. She begins to learn that sometimes it takes practice to be good at something.

episodes.name: Big Brother Binky
episodes.overview: When Binky's parents tell him that they're adopting from China, he isn't sure what to make of it at first. He learns that "adopting" means that he's going to become an actual big brother to a baby girl and will be heading to China to meet his new sister. Binky eagerly assists with preparations for the big trip and the new arrival, but begins to become concerned that his parents will no longer have any time for him. After his worries are eased, the big moment finally comes. At first, Binky is ill at ease around his new sister, who seems to cry a lot, but then discovers a special talent. Back at home, he's eager to show off his new talent to his friends, but finds that he seems to have lost it.

episodes.name: Is That Kosher?
episodes.overview: Francine's convinced that she can fast on Yom Kippur just like her older sister. But then Arthur wins a free pizza party for all his friends for that very same day! Will Francine be able to resist?

episodes.name: Never, Never, Never
episodes.overview: When D.W's extra toys fall into the hands of the destructive Tibble twins, she worries that no one loves her anymore - until Arthur comes to the rescue and proves that giving gifts isn't the only way of showing you care.

episodes.name: Room to Ride
episodes.overview: Binky really enjoys riding his bike, both for fun and as a means of getting to school and back. Binky is devastated when his mother forbids him from riding on the potholed streets after he comes home injured.

episodes.name: D.W.'s Stray Netkitin
episodes.overview: D.W. enjoys taking care of her Netkitten, but finds herself cut off when the Read family computer suffers from not one, but two computer viruses.

episodes.name: For the Birds
episodes.overview: Brain is delighted when he learns that the green-tailed grebe, a bird previously believed to be extinct, has been sighted in the forests of Elwood City. He's determined to be the first to take photographic evidence of it, but becomes worried when Mr. Ratburn starts a bird-watching club.

episodes.name: The Chronicles of Buster
episodes.overview: Buster is enthralled by the new Collector's Edition of The Chronicles of Amayzzia, so much so that it seems like it's all that he can talk about.

episodes.name: No Acting Please
episodes.overview: When Fern lands a role in the Elwood City community production of It Began With a Whistle, she fears that she is not talented enough to be a star actress.

episodes.name: Prunella Deegan and the Disappointing Ending
episodes.overview: The final volume of the Henry Screever series is released at last. Prunella and Marina compete to see who will be first to finish the book.

episodes.name: The Silent Treatment
episodes.overview: George wonders whether anyone would notice if he just disappeared, and so vows not to speak until someone notices him. Of course, his friends do notice, and they decide to cheer him up with a surprise party.

episodes.name: Kung Fool
episodes.overview: While volunteering to help an elderly neighbour with his household chores, Fern discovers his past life as a kung fu celebrity.

episodes.name: Arthur's Number Nightmare
episodes.overview: When Arthur and the gang suspect they are being ranked at school, they become obsessed with what the numbers mean.

episodes.name: Brain Gets Hooked
episodes.overview: Brain gets hooked on the latest tween reality show, Junior Island. He knows he has a problem when he starts to ignore his friends and his schoolwork. But what can he do to break the addiction?

episodes.name: MacFrensky
episodes.overview: When Francine and the Brain are locked in a stiff competition to win Student of the Month, Muffy talks Francine into 'borrowing' Buster's toy and letting Brain take the blame for it. As the lies grow and the prize gets closer, however, Francine's guilt increases.

episodes.name: The Good, the Bad, and the Binky
episodes.overview: As Emily's new babysitter, Binky introduces his charge to the world of pro-wrestling, and teaches her some fierce moves. But when Emily starts ruffling the feathers of other pre-schoolers on the playground, Binky worries that he has not been the best role model.

episodes.name: The Great MacGrady
episodes.overview: When Lakewood Elementary's beloved lunch lady Mrs. MacGrady is diagnosed with cancer, Arthur and his friends all react differently to the news.

episodes.name: When Carl met George
episodes.overview: George is excited about spending time with his new friend Carl, who seems to know all kind of cool facts about trains and about... well lots of things! Then George learns that Carl has Asperger's Syndrome - a form of autism that makes Carl see the world differently than most people.

episodes.name: The Portrait of the Artist as a Young Tibble
episodes.overview: The Tibbles sell their art works to raise money for a toy by using pity.

episodes.name: Fernlets by Fern
episodes.overview: Fern and Muffy start a greeting card business. Muffy paints the covers and Fern writes the poems. All the work makes Fern lose interest in writing, so she tries to figure out how to get make it interesting again.

episodes.name: Paradise Lost
episodes.overview: Baby Kate begins to learn to talk, but starts to not be able to understand Pal anymore. They go to the Dolly Llama for an answer.

episodes.name: Looking for Bonnie
episodes.overview: Famous rock musician Dean Lomax visits Elwood City and calls on George's dad to fix his equally famous guitar named Bonnie.

episodes.name: The Wheel Deal
episodes.overview: Brain learns how to play basketball while in a wheelchair from a girl named Lydia.

episodes.name: The Agent of Change
episodes.overview: Annoyed by gender stereotypes in the media, Francine, Muffy and Molly make their own little animated movie with girls as the main characters.

episodes.name: Falafelosophy
episodes.overview: Sue Ellen writes a graphic novel about circles and triangles. However her friends think it's unusual.

episodes.name: Tales of Grotesquely Grim Bunny
episodes.overview: Arthur, Buster and Fern buy one Grotesquely Grim Bunny comic after the local comic store goes under new management. Arthur is afraid to admit the new comics scare him.

episodes.name: Follow the Bouncing Ball
episodes.overview: When Alberto and Francine accidentally exchange soccer balls in the park, Alberto's ball travels with Francine throughout Elwood City and, eventually, the world.

episodes.name: Buster Baxter & the Letter from the Sea
Around the World in 11 Minutes
episodes.overview: In an attempt to discover just how big the world is, Pal, Kate, Mei-Lin, and Amigo take an imaginary trip around the world.

episodes.name: Muffy and the Big Bad Blog
Arthur Unravels
episodes.overview: Arthur's Grandmother teaches him how to knit. However, embarrassed by his new skill, he tries to hide it from everyone else.

episodes.name: D.W., Queen of the Comeback
episodes.overview: When D.W. gets her hair cut too short by a clown barber, the Tibbles begin to tease her about it, prompting her to seek advice on comebacks.

episodes.name: Buster Spaces Out
episodes.overview: Buster decides to build a model rocket ship.

episodes.name: Fifteen
episodes.overview: Arthur has fifteen minutes to get back home get his report and get back to school before class starts.

episodes.name: I Wanna Hold Your Hand
episodes.overview: George sees Binky hold his mother's hand. Binky doesn't want anyone else to know.

episodes.name: Buster's Secret Admirer
episodes.overview: Buster receives chocolates in the mail from a "secret admirer" and tries to uncover who it was sent by.

episodes.name: Cents-less
episodes.overview: Mr. Ratburn decides to have his students learn a lesson about handling money. Telling them that they can't spend any money for the weekend and have to barter for what they want.

episodes.name: To Eat or Not to Eat
episodes.overview: A new candy bar that Buster wants to try is making anyone who eats the candy bar act strange.

episodes.name: Prunella the Pack Rat
episodes.overview: Prunella receives help from her friends to clean out her closet. She has kept everything since she was a baby, making her closet very full.

episodes.name: Muffy's Classy Classics Club
episodes.overview: Muffy starts a book club. Things don't go over so well when she starts picking out all the books for the club members to read.

episodes.name: Buster's Garden of Grief
episodes.overview: Fritz asks Buster to take care of the community garden for him while he recovers from his ankle injury. Buster has to stop short when he finds out he's going on a camping trip with his mother. So, he asks Muffy, Francine and Arthur to care for the garden for him.

episodes.name: The Butler Did...What?
episodes.overview: Bailey disappears, and Muffy tries to find him. In doing so she discovers that she doesn't really know much about her Butler.

episodes.name: Grandpa Dave's Memory Album
episodes.overview: Grandpa Dave moves closer to the family. The problem is he can't remember much about anything anymore due to his Alzheimer's Disease, so Arthur and D.W. assemble a memory album for Dave.

episodes.name: Based on a True Story
episodes.overview: A new girl named Ladonna moves to Elwood City from Louisiana with her family. In order to make friends, she tells the Lakewood students stories about her life. As she continues with her tales, the stories begin to repeat, and the kids are noticing. Ladonna begins to fabricate her stories and is caught by the Brain when she makes an actual mistake.

episodes.name: Flippity Francine
episodes.overview: Muffy videotapes Francine attempting a soccer stunt that goes horribly wrong, and uploads it online, where it becomes increasingly popular. Francine is initially embarrassed, but when she sees how popular she is, she begins to let the fame go to her head.

episodes.name: All About DW
episodes.overview: D.W. get jealous when Emily gets to be Little Red Riding hood and D.W. has to be tree number two.

episodes.name: Get Smart
episodes.overview: Mr. Ratburn must prove that his answers are correct and that a 100% accurate computer's answers are wrong.

episodes.name: Night of the Tibble
episodes.overview: The Tibble twins are having their first sleepover and invite James over.

episodes.name: The Last Tough Customer
episodes.overview: The Tough Customers have to change their ways. Molly might not be able to do so.

episodes.name: Brain's Chess Mess
episodes.overview: In order to improve his game for a competition Brain forms a chess club.

episodes.name: Baseball Blues
episodes.overview: George can't wait to play baseball.

episodes.name: Brain's Biggest Blunder
episodes.overview: Brain teaches Buster arithmetic.

episodes.name: Buster's Book Battle
episodes.overview: Buster starts reading books in order to earn points to win prizes.

episodes.name: On the Buster Scale
episodes.overview: Buster and Brain disagree over movie reviews.

episodes.name: Fern and the Case of the Stolen Story
episodes.overview: Suffering from a case of writers' block, Fern begins to copy some of Ladonna's stories.

episodes.name: Sue Ellen Vegges Out
episodes.overview: Sue Ellen makes a change in her diet, prompting Muffy and Francine to try and imitate her vegetarianism.

episodes.name: So Funny I Forgot to Laugh
episodes.overview: Arthur's teasing of Sue Ellen's new sweater makes her feel bad.

episodes.name: The Best Day Ever
episodes.overview: Everyone remembers their best days.

episodes.name: Show-Off
episodes.overview: It's the Elwood City Dog Show and Killer is facing off against Sebastian Winkleplotz, the snobby, championship-winning poodle.

episodes.name: Dog's Best Friend
episodes.overview: Arthur agrees to watch his neighbor's dog Amigo while Alberto is away. However, when Arthur is looking after Amigo, Pal feels he is losing his rank as top dog of the house.

episodes.name: Adventures in Budylon
episodes.overview: D.W. and Bud embark on an epic wilderness adventure! Dense jungles, mystic ruins, the backyard has never been so exciting!

episodes.name: Ladonna Compson: Party Animal
episodes.overview: Apple picking, bake sales, craft classes... there's so much to do in Elwood City in the fall! And Ladonna's determined to do it all. But when you're juggling so much at once, you're bound to drop a ball... or five.

episodes.name: Molina's Mulligan
episodes.overview: Alberto discovers that he has a natural talent for golf and begins competing at the local country club. But will his dad's over-enthusiastic and embarrassing cheers cause him to give up the sport altogether?

episodes.name: Buster Bombs
episodes.overview: Buster has lost his flair for funny, and the harder he tries to make people laugh, the worse it gets.

episodes.name: Opposites Distract
episodes.overview: Arthur and Buster have always been best friends. But when a leaky roof forces Arthur to study in Buster's room, they discover they make better friends then roommates.

episodes.name: Just the Ticket
episodes.overview: Arthur's ecstatic when he wins free concert tickets on the radio. The problem is, he can only take one friend.

episodes.name: All Thumbs
episodes.overview: When Arthur catches Buster sucking his thumb, Buster worries that Arthur will tell the entire school.

episodes.name: Kidonia
episodes.overview: Tired of doing chores, Arthur and the gang decide to invent their own country: Kidonia.

episodes.name: Speak Up, Francine!
episodes.overview: The local creek is polluted! Francine is determined to get the word out at the annual Earth Day rally, but she can't seem to speak up, so Ladonna attempts to help.

episodes.name: Waiting for Snow
episodes.overview: Ladonna can't wait to experience her first blizzard. Skiing, sledding, snow days! If only the weather would cooperate. Arthur and Buster attempt to help her. Meanwhile, D.W teaches Bud how to make snowballs.

episodes.name: Pets and Pests
episodes.overview: When a mouse is discovered in the Read house, Arthur uses Nemo to try get rid of it, making Pal worried. Then, Ladonna shows up and shows Arthur, D.W., and Bud that mice can be friends as well as foes.

episodes.name: Go Fly a Kite
episodes.overview: Muffy, Binky, and Ladonna find Carl's lost kite and they argue over who should take possession of it.

episodes.name: The Director's Cut
episodes.overview: After meeting his hero, George is inspired to make a movie of his own, but he doesn't seem to be getting his own way in it.

episodes.name: Crime and Consequences
episodes.overview: When George accidentally breaks the class's prize woodworking project, Binky gets unfairly blamed.

episodes.name: Caught In the Crosswires
episodes.overview: Muffy is thrilled when mega producer J3 chooses her family for his latest reality TV project.

episodes.name: Framed!
episodes.overview: Buster has just won the best young artist award at the Elwood City Arts Festival. Sensing his work might be worth something someday, Muffy hires Buster to paint her portrait.

episodes.name: Binky's Music Madness
episodes.overview: Everyone loves the Bang on a Can All-Stars, a funky experimental music group that's touring around Elwood City. Everyone that is, except Binky. A musical purist, Binky thinks their nontraditional sound is just a bunch of noise and sets out to prove it.

episodes.name: Brain Freeze
episodes.overview: A new ice cream shop has just opened up across the block. With whimsical flavor names, futuristic furniture, and a cute mascot named Puk Puk, Yumbobo is threatening to put Brain's shop out of business.

episodes.name: The Friend Who Wasn't There
episodes.overview: After she hears D.W. talking to her imaginary friend, Muffy tries to find her own.

episodes.name: Surprise!
episodes.overview: When she is un-invited to Catherine's sixteenth birthday party, Francine tries to to make it the worst party ever.

episodes.name: The Case of the Girl With the Long Face
episodes.overview: George is concerned about Fern when she falls into a state of sadness, but doesn't know why. Wanting to get to the bottom of the mystery, he enlists Buster Baxter to investigate.

episodes.name: The Substitute Arthur
episodes.overview: Buster has to find someone else to hang out with while Arthur is on a weekend trip.

episodes.name: The Tattletale Frog
episodes.overview: Bud Compson continuously wins against D.W., so she suggests a game called Throw the Hat, in which she accidentally breaks Dad's Froggy.

episodes.name: D.W. & Bud's Higher Purpose
episodes.overview: When D.W. and Bud are too short to go on a roller coaster, they try to trick the ticket taker into letting them get on.

episodes.name: Best Wishes
episodes.overview: After wishes for snow and cupcakes come true, Buster, Francine, and Binky are convinced that George has Wish Mojo, and put him under incredible pressure to use his new Wish Mojo to wish for even more snow.

episodes.name: Fountain Abbey
episodes.overview: Muffy is sad to discover that one of her ancestors worked as a maid for one of Binky's ancestors - a lord. Upon further investigation, Muffy finds out how that maid got promoted to a business manager.

episodes.name: Arthur Calls It
episodes.overview: Arthur is umpiring a baseball game against Mighty Mountain and he has to decide whether Buster properly scored a home run.

episodes.name: Two Minutes
episodes.overview: Timmy is outraged when he discovers Tommy was born two minutes before he was, leading to Tommy acting like a superior to Timmy.

episodes.name: Messy Dress Mess
episodes.overview: Ladonna is cast an important role in an upcoming school musical, and Muffy lends her a dress for the rehearsal.

episodes.name: Whip. Mix. Blend.
episodes.overview: When Rattles and his mother are invited to stay at her boyfriend's house for a weekend, Rattles must learn to get along with his two kids.

episodes.name: Staycation
episodes.overview: D.W camps out in the backyard and learns that doing such a thing can be an adventure in its own right.

episodes.name: Shelter from the Storm
episodes.overview: A powerful hurricane hits Elwood City. Ladonna's dad is called up by the Army Corps of Engineers. Muffy relocates to a shelter, while Arthur struggles to reunite lost pets and owners. And Brain seeks the help of a therapist to help him manage his anxiety.

episodes.name: Arthur Read, Super Saver
episodes.overview: After hearing a slideshow on the Great Depression, Arthur begins to worry about the amount of money his family seems to be wasting through usage of water, electricity and lawn mowers.

episodes.name: Tibbles to the Rescue
episodes.overview: D.W saves Tommy and Timmy from a fall, and they decide to repay her, much to D.W's annoyance.

episodes.name: The Pageant Pickle
episodes.overview: Arthur is embarrassed about having to go see D.W's spring pageant, which he believes to be a waste of time.

episodes.name: Some Assembly Required
episodes.overview: D.W is waiting for her new playground to be built, and all she has to play with is the box that it came in.

episodes.name: Brain's Brain
episodes.overview: Brain, D.W and Bud venture into Brain's brain after neither can remember where they can find the last Easter Egg in the Easter Egg Hunt.

episodes.name: Brain Sees Stars
episodes.overview: Brain plans on seeing a meteor shower. He thinks he is cursed since every year something goes wrong and cannot see it.

episodes.name: Sue Ellen Adds It Up
episodes.overview: Sue Ellen is dismissive about maths until she runs into a problem her artistic vision cannot solve.

episodes.name: Wish You Were Here
episodes.overview: Sue Ellen meets her pen pal but he is more interested in fashion than world culture.

episodes.name: Arthur's Toy Trouble
episodes.overview: Arthur gets a Mutant Muck Monster as a gift, which he later learns is worth two million dollars unboxed, but it has fallen into the D.W.'s hands.

episodes.name: Spar for the Course
episodes.overview: After Binky wrecks the 18th hole at a miniature golf course, Muffy, Buster and Binky attempt to create a new 18th hole.

episodes.name: Carl's Concerto
episodes.overview: Carl agrees to play the accordion for George's puppet show reenactment of Goldilocks and the Three Bears for the local preschool class.

episodes.name: Too Much of a Good Thing
episodes.overview: Buster enlists Binky's help as a method to prevent him from gorging cookies at a constant rate.

episodes.name: The Last Day
episodes.overview: Arthur and his friends are moving into the fourth grade, which Muffy and Francine are concerned about. Meanwhile, Arthur and Buster have their sights set on being in the fourth-grade class taught by the 'cool' new teacher.

episodes.name: Maria Speaks
episodes.overview: Aria, a silent girl in Mr. Ratburn's class, finally gets a chance to speak when she is appointed a school news anchor.

episodes.name: Postcards from Binky
episodes.overview: Binky's grandparents miss his big soccer game, and so he attempts a reenactment of the event making video postcards just as Buster did when he left with his dad.

episodes.name: Mr. Ratburn's Secret Identity
episodes.overview: Arthur and his friends believe that Mr. Ratburn has a secret identity.

episodes.name: Besties
episodes.overview: When Buster and Ladonna bond, Arthur feels left out.

episodes.name: Carried Away
episodes.overview: Pal's cousin Dr. Yowl whisks Pal, Kate and Mei Lin away on an adventure through the solar system in his kennel.

episodes.name: Dueling Detectives
episodes.overview: When George's giraffe puppet Wally goes missing, Fern and Binky war over who can find him.

episodes.name: Buster Isn't Buying It
episodes.overview: After believing a false science show, Buster decides to never believe in anything without proof again.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: One Ornery Critter - Buster is tasked with taking care of his aunt's dog Carrotcake, but she dislikes Arthur, which concerns him, as he believes that it will sabotage his position as being universally loved by dogs.

episodes.name: Francine's Cleats of Strength
episodes.overview: Francine needs money to buy some new cleats, so she takes a job as Muffy's personal assistant.

episodes.name: Little Miss Meanie
episodes.overview: Muffy and Lydia join forces to topple a snobbish and unpleasant beauty queen.

episodes.name: Buster's Second Chance
episodes.overview: After Brain wins a science fair, Buster begins to wonder how different his life would be if he was smarter.

episodes.name: Arthur and the Whole Truth
episodes.overview: While Arthur is practicing for a piano recital, he learns that Buster has been telling him white lies just to not hurt his feelings. Arthur and Buster agree to not tell any more white lies.

episodes.name: Fern's Flights of Fancy
episodes.overview: Fern decides to enter a writer's contest.

episodes.name: Cereal
episodes.overview: After a box of D.W.'s favorite cereal goes missing, Arthur is accused of taking it.

episodes.name: He Said, He Said
episodes.overview: Arthur, Buster, and George are excited to watch a special Bionic Bunny episode, but the TV blacks out. Meanwhile, D.W. and Bud are building a huge Tower of Cows, which Carl also starts doing.

episodes.name: Bunny Trouble
episodes.overview: It's D.W.'s turn to watch the preschool class bunny.

episodes.name: Bud's Knotty Problem
episodes.overview: Bud learns to tie his shoes after seeing a pair of boots that he wants.

episodes.name: That's My Grandma!
episodes.overview: When Grandma Thora becomes the most popular babysitter in Elwood City, D.W. becomes upset.

episodes.name: Lend Me Your Ear
episodes.overview: Mr. Ratburn has a complete change in attitude, much to Arthur, Buster, and Brain's concern.

episodes.name: The Butler Did It
episodes.overview: Mr. Crosswire gets a robot butler, but Muffy fears Bailey may be replaced.

episodes.name: Prunella's Tent of Portent
episodes.overview: Prunella claims she can see the future, but Marina doubts it.

episodes.name: Mutiny on the Pitch
episodes.overview: Francine decides to leave her soccer position to Buster when the Lakewood Elementary soccer team claims she is too bossy.

episodes.name: The Hallway Minotaur
episodes.overview: George becomes the Lakewood Elementary hallway monitor.

episodes.name: Ladonna's Like List
episodes.overview: Ladonna begins a list to see how many people like her.

episodes.name: Binky's A Game
episodes.overview: Binky gets an A on a test and Muffy and Francine think he cheated.

episodes.name: Brain and the Time Capsule
episodes.overview: Brain creates a time capsule but soon he gets frustrated when everyone wants to put something in.

episodes.name: The Master Builders
episodes.overview: Buster keeps failing at creating a birdhouse to keep the community safe while Muffy and Francine come up with a new company named "Skywire" and attempt to create a cat toy.

episodes.name: Francine and the Soccer Spy
episodes.overview: Ladonna befriends a member of the Mighty Mountain soccer team.

episodes.name: Sue Ellen and the Last Page
episodes.overview: The City Council votes to close down the Elwood City Library and Sue Ellen attempts to save it.

episodes.name: Muffy Misses Out
episodes.overview: Muffy goes to an opera but is also worrying that the members of Mrs. McGrady's bake sale will need her help.

episodes.name: Arthur Takes a Stand
episodes.overview: Arthur discovers that Mrs. McGrady manages the cafeteria without any help and tries to hire her an assistant.

episodes.name: Slink's Special Talent
episodes.overview: Slink thinks that his special talent is being a newspaper boy.

episodes.name: Take a Hike, Molly
episodes.overview: The Tough Customers go on a hiking trail.

episodes.name: The Lost Dinosaur
episodes.overview: Bud loses his imaginary friend Rapty, a dinosaur, and becomes worried what he'll do without him.

episodes.name: The Princess Problem
episodes.overview: D.W. and Emily tell a student the story of a princess and have a substitute teacher for PE.

episodes.name: Invasion of the Soccer Fans
episodes.overview: D.W., Arthur, Vicita, Mr. Read, Grandma Thora, and Vicita's father watch a soccer game on TV and Baby Kate becomes addicted to it.

episodes.name: Pal and the Big Itch
episodes.overview: When Pal goes into a trash can and rolls in the garbage, he gets an itch.

episodes.name: Mr. Ratburn and the Special Someone
Binky Can't Always Get What He Wants
D.W.'s New Best Friend
episodes.overview: D.W. meets 13-year-old Hana, who is much older and totally cool.

episodes.name: George Scraps His Sculpture
episodes.overview: George volunteers to create a piece of art for the county-wide art show and can't decide what to make.
